detailed_analyses.item: Articles of incorporation; certificates of incorporation
By-laws; operating agreements; amendments
Board and shareholder meeting minutes; written consents; materials presented
Organizational chart of Company and subsidiaries
Current officers and directors list
Officer and director biographical information
Trade names; fictitious names; aliases used since inception
Company and subsidiary addresses; office and property locations
Jurisdictions of registration or qualification; certificates of authority
Equity structure; authorized and outstanding shares; classes or series
Shareholder and securities holders schedule; rights to acquire securities; consideration paid
Certificates evidencing shares, options, warrants, bonds, or securities
Shareholder agreements; voting trusts; proxies; restrictive agreements
Applications or permits for issuance or transfer of securities
Agreements, memoranda, or offering materials relating to securities sales; investor correspondence; ...
Agreements granting rights over issued/unissued securities (purchase, repurchase, preemptive, regist...
Agreements to issue securities or equity interests; amendments
Directors' and officers' questionnaires (most recent)
Indemnification agreements for directors and officers
Other organizational documents not covered above
Audited financial statements
Unaudited financial statements
Independent auditor reports
Audit correspondence; management letters; special reports; counsel letters to auditors
Unrecorded liabilities not in financial statements
Budgets; projected financial statements; cash flow forecasts
Accounting policies and changes in methods or principles
Write-downs and write-offs outside ordinary course
Accounts receivable aging schedules
General and administrative (G&A) expense breakdown
Revenue, gross margin, and average selling price breakdown
Valuations of equity securities
Contingent liabilities (recorded)
Other financial and accounting documents not covered above
State and local jurisdictions for tax filings and payments; schedule of taxes paid
Federal, state, local tax returns (last 3 closed years + open years)
Evidence Company is current on all taxes (income, property, payroll, VAT, etc.)
Tax audits (3 closed + open years); correspondence
Tax sharing or tax benefit agreements; state unitary filings
Consents and agreements with tax authorities
Tax deficiency assessments and resolutions
Pending or threatened disputes with tax authorities
Real estate taxes payable
Notices of assessment; revenue agent reports for open years
IRS Form 3115 filings; Section 481(a) depreciation adjustments
Tax shelters; reportable transactions
Acquisitions lacking pre-closing tax indemnities
ASC 740 (FIN 48) reserves; underlying issues and assessments
Other tax documents not covered above
Banks, creditors, guarantors, lenders list and relationships
Debt instruments; lines of credit; amendments, consents, waivers
Security agreements; trust indentures; mortgages; deeds of trust; guaranties; installment purchases;...
Debt, guaranty, indemnification, or similar arrangements with insiders
Outstanding letters of credit; performance and other bonds
Mortgages, liens, security interests, encumbrances
Compliance reports (past 3 years) related to debt instruments
Compliance certificates for covenants or restrictions
Material correspondence with lenders
Other loan and obligation documents not covered above
Physical assets and equipment schedules; ownership and lease terms
Inventories: descriptions, locations, quantities
Real property owned or leased
Title insurance policies; abstracts of title; deeds; certificates
Leases, subleases, financing and security agreements; lessor/lessee correspondence on defaults
Appraisal reports and surveys of real property
Warranties and guaranties for real and personal property
Other property and equipment documents not covered above
Registered copyrights, trademarks, service marks, patents; certificates of registration
Unregistered IP and pending applications
IP acquisition, assignment, licensing agreements; related correspondence
Software owned, licensed, or used
Royalty, fee, and license agreements; concessions or special rights
Internet domain names held, assigned, or used
Claims for infringement or violation of proprietary rights
Company IP policies (registration, use, maintenance, monitoring)
Other intellectual property documents not covered above
Joint venture, partnership, teaming, subcontract, alliance agreements
Customer agreements comprising top 10% of revenues; other major agreements
Brokers, finders, financial advisory agreements
Affiliates and associates list (per SEC Rule 12b-2)
Agreements with affiliates/associates (tax sharing, indemnification, leases, consulting, facilities,...
Insurance policies (general liability, property, casualty, D&O, workers comp, key man, cyber, excess...
Insurance cancellations, non-renewals, or declinations
Insurance claims experience
Self-insurance or captive programs; actuarial reports
Documents on insurance and liability exposure; reserve funds, accounts
Contemplated JVs, partnerships, alliances, acquisitions, divestitures
Other contracts (acquisition, purchase, agency, land, construction, supply, government agreements, d...
Trade associations or advocacy group memberships
Material consents, approvals, notices, filings for the Transaction
Hedging or swap agreements; commodities trading policies; hedge identification for tax purposes
Agreements with government entities
Pending bids or recompetes for government contracts
Other material contracts not covered above
Customers or clients list
Suppliers and third-party service providers list
Purchase and supply contract forms; pricing terms, rebates, concessions
Marketing, sales, franchise, distribution, agency, promotion, influencer agreements; independent sal...
Business plans, marketing plans, sales forecasts, consultant studies, industry trend reports
Advertising, promotion, PR agreements; advertising materials, brochures, marketing collateral
Credit and collection policies
Internal policy manuals (including social media and online privacy)
Press releases
Significant operational changes (past 2 years)
Competitor analyses and reports
Customer satisfaction surveys
Social media platforms used; company accounts; access lists
Other operational documents not covered above
Pending or threatened litigation; governmental investigations involving Company or subsidiaries
Litigation or investigations involving officers, directors, or >5% shareholders
Court or agency orders, writs, decrees, injunctions, judgments, rulings binding Company
Settlements of litigation; waiver agreements cancelling material claims
Settlement documents; tolling agreements; statute extensions
Disputes with suppliers, competitors, customers, clients; resolutions
Auditor/accountant correspondence on threatened or pending litigation, assessments, or claims
Other litigation documents not covered above
Regulatory filings, reports, licenses, permits, consents, approvals required for business
Regulatory filings, reports, permits, certificates obtained by Company
Violations or alleged violations of laws/regulations
Correspondence with regulatory bodies; notices of violations
Minutes/transcripts of meetings with regulatory agencies; related correspondence
Governmental filings and consents required for share purchase
Antitrust compliance program; manuals and policies
Other regulatory documents not covered above
Officers, directors, managers, key employees, consultants, contractors: titles, tenure, compensation
Employment, consultant, contractor, non-compete, confidentiality, nondisclosure agreements
Loans or transactions between Company and insiders
Benefit and compensation plans (pension, retirement, incentive, stock options, welfare, insurance)
IRS determination letters; Form 5500s (last 3 years); actuarial reports
Welfare plan data: premiums, claims, reserves, admin expenses (last 3 years)
Collective bargaining agreements
Current labor negotiations
Multiemployer plans (past 6 years)
Multiemployer contributions, withdrawal liabilities, pending claims
Pending/threatened employment claims; union activity; strikes; disputes
Audits/investigations by IRS, DOL, PBGC, OSHA, or other agencies (last 6 years)
Reports/correspondence submitted to government agencies (last 3 years)
Correspondence on reportable events for plans (last 6 years)
Employee handbooks, personnel policies, procedures, manuals
Policies on sexual harassment and misconduct
Other employment and compensation documents not covered above
Privacy policies for employees, customers, consumers (websites, apps, disclosures)
Information security policies (physical, administrative, IT)
Breach response and incident response policies
Internal system audits (last 3 years); compliance with privacy laws
Privacy officer; security officer; designated personnel
Privacy/security training materials (last 3 years)
Certifications (SOC, PCI DSS, HIPAA/HITECH, ISO, CSA, NIST, etc.)
Background checks for employees/contractors with access to personal data
Incidents, investigations, claims, regulatory actions on data privacy/security (last 3 years)
Cross-border data transfer compliance (e.g., GDPR)
Sharing of personal information with affiliates/unaffiliated entities for marketing
Use of cookies, identifiers, web beacons, tracking technologies; third-party trackers
Global/regional databases or applications for storing personal data
Other data privacy and security documents not covered above
Environmental investigations, reviews, assessments (Phase I/II)
Hazardous substances used
Records of handling, storage, transportation, disposal of hazardous substances
Off-site hazardous storage or disposal locations
Studies/reports: pollution, contamination, biodiversity impacts, climate change risks, energy/water ...
Policies/statements on responsible sourcing, supply chain risks
Environmental legal actions, investigations, complaints, settlements, fines
Environmental licenses, permits, authorizations
Known contaminations or hazardous material concerns (asbestos, lead paint, petroleum, mercury, radia...
Customer satisfaction reports
Employee satisfaction reports
Workplace safety violation investigations, litigation, fines, penalties
Product safety violation investigations, litigation, fines, penalties
Workplace safety, child labor, human trafficking policies
Diversity and inclusion policies (board, management, workforce)
Subcontractor, contractor, supplier vetting policies
Responsible persons/systems for supply chain risk monitoring (internal or external)
Suppliers, subcontractors, contractors list; projects and locations
Consumer protection and product safety policies
Recruitment and retention policies
Workplace safety records/policies
Sexual harassment/misconduct investigation processes
Corrective actions taken to prevent further sexual harassment/misconduct
Reports of sexual harassment (last 5 years); including against executives/directors
Settlement agreements relating to sexual harassment/misconduct
Whistleblower and grievance mechanism reports and policies
Compliance with accounting/disclosure standards: reports, policies, disclosures
Internal controls for accounting/disclosure compliance
Responsible persons/systems for monitoring disclosure compliance
Integration of ESG data/issues into executive compensation
Management succession plans or policies
Investor initiatives or activist campaigns related to ESG
Shareholder matters (proxies, activist investors, no-action requests, proposals)
Voluntary ESG standards/frameworks used; related disclosures
Mandatory ESG standards/frameworks applicable; related disclosures
Persons/systems monitoring ESG commitments and priorities
ESG importance measurement systems (shareholder/stakeholder perception surveys)
Other ESG documents not covered above
Major vendors and suppliers; goods/services; spend; relationship length
Significant purchase/master supply/procurement contracts
Standard forms: purchase orders; supply agreements
Vendors/suppliers >5% annual purchases; sole/primary source providers
Vendor qualification, selection, management policies/procedures
Vendor/supplier disputes (last 3 years)
Vendor/supplier audits, performance reviews, quality assessments (last 2 years)
Vendor compliance programs (anti-corruption, modern slavery, ethics)
Vendor rebate programs; volume discounts; special pricing
Anticipated material changes to vendor relationships (next 12 months)
Other vendor documents not covered above
Documents, records, or materials not relevant to or not included within Categories A–N
